title: simcse中为什么要对正例的相似度减去一个margin?
body:
cosine_sim = paddle.matmul(query_cls_embedding, title_cls_embedding, transpose_y=True)
margin_diag = paddle.full(
            shape=[query_cls_embedding.shape[0]],
            fill_value=self.margin,
            dtype=paddle.get_default_dtype())
cosine_sim = cosine_sim - paddle.diag(margin_diag)

在标准的simcse实现中，没有发现margin的存在。但是看paddle的实现时，发现对正例的相似度减去了一个margin。这样做，有什么根据或者好处吗？

body:
使用paddle2.3.1.post112/cuda11.2/3090显卡/paddlenlp2.3.4/Linux/python3.7环境复现SBert的时候，固定随机种子
paddle.seed(100)
random.seed(100)
np.random.seed(100)
并且使用FLAGS_cudnn_deterministic = True结果仍然不能复现，每次训练的acc指标都不能loss也不同；
同torch版本对比，在同一个数据集上(paws_x)，同一个Bert预训练权重 bert-wwm-ext-chinese下：
torch则可以复现，并且torch的acc为0.75(torch不设置随机种子的时候结果也是瞎飞)，paddle的acc0.55-0.62之间随机出现；
请问是环境版本问题还是paddle框架问题还是我代码问题？怎么解决？

title: Add Text2Image into Taskflow
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
Add Text2Image into Taskflow
```python
import paddle
from paddlenlp import Taskflow
from IPython.display import display

model_text = {
    "pai-painter-painting-base-zh": ["风阁水帘今在眼，且来先看早梅红", "见说春风偏有贺，露花千朵照庭闹"],
    "pai-painter-scenery-base-zh": ["海边的日出", "黄昏日落"],
    "pai-painter-commercial-base-zh":
    ["女童套头毛衣打底衫秋冬针织衫童装儿童内搭上衣", "春夏真皮工作鞋女深色软皮久站舒适上班面试职业皮鞋"],
}
for model, prompts in model_text.items():
    text_to_image = Taskflow("text_to_image", model=model)
    images = text_to_image(prompts)
    for image in images:
        display(image)
    paddle.device.cuda.empty_cache()
```
![0 (1)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50394665/183386146-9b265304-7294-46fa-896f-1dd90f44ba31.png)
![1 (1)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50394665/183386193-7a463852-f5f7-49e9-b3b0-3d8f4a9b2576.png)
![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50394665/183386201-59079e4c-d648-4711-9c05-8d48e1acfee2.png)
![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50394665/183386210-c54c7f84-2154-4393-bf44-d1824b5c8d5c.png)
![4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50394665/183386229-68374a39-6e14-4565-b2c6-cc547a729135.png)
![5](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/50394665/183386237-b0243ec5-09fe-47cc-9010-bd9b97fda862.png)



```python
import paddle
from paddlenlp import Taskflow
from IPython.display import display

prompts = [
    "New York Skyline with 'Google Research Pizza Cafe' written with fireworks on the sky.",
    "Dali painting of WALL·E"
]
model_text = {
    "dalle-mini": prompts,
    "dalle-mega-v16": prompts,
    "dalle-mega": prompts
}

for model, prompts in model_text.items():
```

title: 函数paddlenlp.data.data_collator.DataCollatorWithPadding 与描述不符
body:
描述中是pad为batch中最长，实际上最长长度为max_model_length。
```
@dataclass
class DataCollatorWithPadding:
    """
    Data collator that will dynamically pad the inputs to the longest sequence in the batch.

    Args:
        tokenizer (`paddlenlp.transformers.PretrainedTokenizer`):
            The tokenizer used for encoding the data.
    """

    tokenizer: PretrainedTokenizerBase
    padding: Union[bool, str, PaddingStrategy] = True
    max_length: Optional[int] = None
    pad_to_multiple_of: Optional[int] = None
    return_tensors: str = "pd"

    def __call__(self, features: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        batch = self.tokenizer.pad(
            features,
            padding=self.padding,
            max_length=self.max_length,
            pad_to_multiple_of=self.pad_to_multiple_of,
            return_tensors=self.return_tensors,
        )
        if "label" in batch:
            batch["labels"] = batch["label"]
            del batch["label"]
        if "label_ids" in batch:
            batch["labels"] = batch["label_ids"]
            del batch["label_ids"]
        return batch
```
我做的更改是：
```
@dataclass
class DataCollatorWithPadding:
    """
    Data collator that will dynamically pad the inputs to the longest sequence in the *batch* (original implement in paddlenlp pads sequence to model_max_length).

    Args:
        tokenizer (`paddlenlp.transformers.PretrainedTokenizer`):
            The tokenizer used for encoding the data.
    """

    tokenizer: PretrainedTokenizerBase
    padding: Union[bool, str, PaddingStrategy] = True
    max_length: Optional[int] = None
    pad_to_multiple_of: Optional[int] = None
    return_tensors: str = "pd"

    def __call__(self, features: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        input_ids = [x["input_ids"] for x in features]
        max_length = max(list(map(len, input_ids)))
        print(max_length)
        batch = self.tokenizer.pad(
            features,
            padding=self.padding,
            max_length=max_length,
            pad_to_multiple_of=self.pad_to_multiple_of,
            return_tensors=self.return_tensors,
        )
        if "label" in batch:
            batch["labels"] = batch["label"]
            del batch["label"]
        if "label_ids" in batch:
            batch["labels"] = batch["label_ids"]
            del batch["label_ids"]
        return batch
```

title: Add EasyNLP Text2Image model
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Models
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
Add EasyNLP Text2Image model
pytorch code: https://github.com/alibaba/EasyNLP/tree/master/easynlp/modelzoo/models/artist

```python
import paddle
from paddlenlp.transformers import ArtistForImageGeneration, ArtistTokenizer
from PIL import Image

paddle.set_device("gpu:5")
# Initialize the model and tokenizer
model_name_or_path = 'pai-painter-painting-base-zh'
model = ArtistForImageGeneration.from_pretrained(model_name_or_path)
tokenizer = ArtistTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_name_or_path)
model.eval()

# Prepare the model inputs.
prompts = ["风阁水帘今在眼，且来先看早梅红", "见说春风偏有贺，露花千朵照庭闹"]
tokenized_inputs = tokenizer(
    prompts,
    return_tensors="pd",
    padding="max_length",
    truncation=True,
    return_token_type_ids=False,
    return_attention_mask=False,
    max_length=32,
)
top_k = 32
use_faster = True
num_return_sequences = 4
images = model.generate(**tokenized_inputs,
                        top_k=top_k,
                        num_return_sequences=num_return_sequences,
                        use_faster=use_faster)
print(images.shape)
# [2, 4, 256, 256, 3]
images = ((images.cpu().numpy() + 1.0) * 127.5).clip(0, 255).astype("uint8")
# [2, 256, 4*256, 3]
images = images.transpose([0, 2, 1, 3,
                           4]).reshape(-1, images.shape[-3],
                                       num_return_sequences * images.shape[-2],
                                       images.shape[-1])
for i, image in enumerate(images):
    image = Image.fromarray(image)
    image.save(f"figure_{i}.png")
```

            paddle.static.InputSpec(shape=[-1, -1],
                                    dtype="int64"),
            paddle.static.InputSpec(shape=[-1, -1],
                                    dtype="int64"),
        ]
    )

    save_path = os.path.join("./ernie/", "inference")
    paddle.jit.save(model, save_path)

导出onnx:
paddle2onnx --model_dir ernie/ --model_filename inference.pdmodel --params_filename inference.pdiparams --save_file model.onnx --opset_version 11 --enable_onnx_checker 1
测试精度：
python3 infer.py --task_name csl --model_path model.onnx --use_onnxruntime 1 --device cpu --batch_size 8 --model_name_or_path ernie-3.0-base-zh
虽然模型我没微调，但是上述流程每次测出来的精度为啥不一样呢？也没指定数据集，数据集应该是脚本里面默认的
dev_ds = ppnlp_load_dataset('clue', args.task_name, splits='dev')这行指定的clue
测试四次打印分别为：
task name: csl, acc: 0.468
task name: csl, acc: 0.49966666666666665
task name: csl, acc: 0.4483333333333333
task name: csl, acc: 0.5793333333333334


为啥差距这么大呢？

title: UIE的Taskflow在使用fp16时指定了GPU，实际进程还会占用其他的GPU
body:
my_ie = Taskflow("information_extraction", schema=schema, task_path='./uie/checkpoint/model_best', device_id=1)
指定device_id=1运行在GPU1上，实际会在GPU0上拉起一个进程。当进行第一次推理pprint(my_ie("城市内交通费7月5日金额114广州至佛山"))之后，又会在GPU1上拉起一个进程。如图。
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52725062/182547020-139452a5-b16e-4136-bb7e-5d1750dfdaf9.png)
如果不使用fp16，就没有这个问题。猜测应该是使用fp16时onnx的原因。是否可以后续统一到指定的GPU上？

title: 关于readme中应用场景A：文本挖掘/解析模板生成与匹配 的问题
body:
对于文本使用wordtag进行信息抽取后，如 生成readme中的
[作品类_实体][肯定词|是][人物类_实体][场景事件|执导][作品类_概念|电影]

对于这样的模板，我们应该如何进行对句子的匹配呢？readme中没有放实际的例子。

对于wordtag_ie中的set_schema，必须要有实体间的关系，但我们并不需要关系，word_tag也不会抽取关系。

我们如何在不涉及关系的前提下，对句子进行模板匹配，如[作品类_实体][肯定词|是][人物类_实体][场景事件|执导][作品类_概念|电影]

谢谢您

New features

Models

### Description
Support layout model to remove visual backbone for speed-up. Specifially,
* LayoutLMv2(SER 84.5%, 31.46ms) -> LayoutLMv2-wo-backbone(SER 82.1%, 27.80ms)
* LayoutXLM(SER 89.5%, 19.49ms) -> LayoutXLM-wo-backbone(SER 90.5%, 15.49ms)

**Note** The time cost is tested on V100 GPU for trt+fp16

3）batch_size=1,max_seq_lenth=512,train600条，test200条，dev200条


`# 模型训练：
import paddle.nn.functional as F
import time

save_dir = "checkpoint/bert-wwm"
if not os.path.exists(save_dir):
    os.makedirs(save_dir)

save_train_result = "./results/bert-wwm.tsv"
train_r_df = pd.DataFrame(data=None, columns=["global_step","epoch","step","loss","acc","time"])
    
pre_accu=0
accu=0
global_step = 0
epochs = 10
for epoch in range(1, epochs + 1):
    for step, batch in enumerate(train_data_loader, start=1):
        start = time.time()
        input_ids, segment_ids, labels = batch
        logits = model(input_ids, segment_ids)
        loss = criterion(logits, labels)
        probs = F.softmax(logits, axis=1)
        correct = metric.compute(probs, labels)
        metric.update(correct)
        acc = metric.accumulate()
        global_step += 1
        if global_step % 2 == 0 :
            print("global step %d, epoch: %d, batch: %d, loss: %.5f, acc: %.5f" % (global_step, epoch, step, loss, acc))
            loss.backward()
        optimizer.step()
        lr_scheduler.step()
        optimizer.clear_grad()
        #统计运行时间
        end = time.time()
        train_r_df = train_r_df.append({"global_step":global_step, "epoch":epoch,"step":step,"loss":loss,"acc":acc,"time":end-start},ignore_index=True)
    # 每轮结束对验证集进行评估
    accu = evaluate(model, criterion, metric, dev_data_loader)
    print(accu)  
    if accu > pre_accu:
        # 保存较上一轮效果更优的模型参数
        save_param_path = os.path.join(save_dir, 'model_state.pdparams')  # 保存模型参数
        paddle.save(model.state_dict(), save_param_path)
        pre_accu=accu
tokenizer.save_pretrained(save_dir)
train_r_df.to_csv(save_train_result, sep="\t", index=False, header=True)`

title: Add data augmentation strategy

### PR types
Others

### PR changes
APIs

### Description
新增基于MLM预测的词级别替换和插入的数据增强策略和利用TF-IDF计算句子中单词重要性进行概率抽样还有文档

- 本项目中基于ERNIE 1.0中文预训练模型，根据词向量上下文预测被掩码单词（也即待替换或待插入单词）
- TF-IDF需要根据输入文件计算句子的TF-IDF分数，每个单词被抽中的概率为(max(tfidf)-tfidf)/sum(max(tfidf)-tfidf)，这里max(tfidf)为一个句子中单词TF-IDF最高分数。

title: UIE模型如何添加新字符到vocab.txt中，并重新训练
body:
欢迎您反馈PaddleNLP使用问题，非常感谢您对PaddleNLP的贡献！
在留下您的问题时，辛苦您同步提供如下信息：
- 版本、环境信息
1）PaddleNLP和PaddlePaddle版本：
     paddlepaddle-gpu           2.2.0.post111
     paddlenlp                         2.3.4
2）系统环境：请您描述系统类型，例如Linux/Windows/MacOS/，python版本
      linux，python3.6
- 复现信息：
采用uie模型做信息提取时，发现对“HRB400Φ16"这个词的提取结果有误。
预期结果为:
'HRB400Φ16' = {'牌号':'HRB400','公称直径':'Φ16'}
实际训练后的预测结果:
'HRB400Φ16' = {'牌号':'HRB400Φ16','公称直径':'HRB400Φ16'}

阅读这部分源代码之后，发现是wordpiece的分词的问题，调用代码得到结果如下：
标准分类/黑色及有色金属/工字钢 钢筋 HRB400Φ16 品牌:河北鑫达;单位:吨;
分词结果 = ['标', '准', '分', '类', '/', '黑', '色', '及', '有', '色', '金', '属', '/', '工', '字', '钢', '钢', '筋', '[UNK]', '品', '牌', ':', '河', '北', '鑫', '达', ';', '单', '位', ':', '吨', ';']
发现‘HRB400Φ16’不能被wordpiece分词器处理，最后被识别为'[UNK]'
之后继续定位问题，发现对应的vocab.txt中确实没有'##Φ'这样的子词，导致wordpiece不能正常分词

因此目前这种情况如何处理，或者如何添加新字符到vocab.txt，并重新训练当前模型？多谢
